feedback:
Excellent application of the DRIVER framework throughout your work. You clearly demonstrated 6 stages: D, R, I, V, E, R2.


STRENGTHS:
- Integrate AI: The submission shows an integrated AI workflow (news aggregation, prompt-driven advisory output, automated email delivery) with explicit guardrails and reflection on limitations, demonstrating effective AI integration beyond superficial use. Discover, Implement, and Reflect evidence collectively support a thorough, functional integration.


AREAS FOR IMPROVEMENT:
- Financial APP: The submission demonstrates a working financial application at a basic level—aggregating news into investment-oriented summaries and automating delivery—(Discover and Implement evidence). However, it lacks thorough financial analysis, structured advice (risk profiles, detailed recommendations), and polished output, so it meets the category only partially rather than the comprehensive standard required for a PASS.

criteria.criterion_name: Financial APP: The tool functions as a financial application.
evidence: "I used a personal investment advisor but also it gathered sort of tech news and world news and then kind of transfer that into investment advice."
"I thought it was cool that actually I was able to send it to my email."
"It shows key news and then you can kind of take investment advice from that."
criteria.driver_alignment:
- Discover: student defined the concept (news-to-investment-advice) demonstrating intent to build a financial app.
- Implement: student executed features (JSON output, email delivery) showing the tool performs financial-related tasks.
- Reflect: student noted limitations (formatting issues) and potential enhancements, indicating awareness of functional gaps.
criteria.reasoning: The submission demonstrates a working financial application at a basic level—aggregating news into investment-oriented summaries and automating delivery—(Discover and Implement evidence). However, it lacks thorough financial analysis, structured advice (risk profiles, detailed recommendations), and polished output, so it meets the category only partially rather than the comprehensive standard required for a PASS.

criteria.criterion_name: Integrate AI: The tool integrates AI capabilities effectively.
evidence: "I used a personal investment advisor but also it gathered sort of tech news and world news and then kind of transfer that into investment advice."
"I applied some strict guard rails, no personalized advice of any kind. Um, no promises or certain predictions. Um, always include a clear disclaimer at the end."
"I thought it was cool that actually I was able to send it to my email."
criteria.driver_alignment:
Discover: student identified an AI use case (news ingestion → investment advice) and wrote a prompt.  
Implement: student showed the AI output node and an automated email delivery feature.  
Reflect: student evaluated limitations (formatting) and proposed enhancements (tables, risk tiers).
criteria.reasoning: The submission shows an integrated AI workflow (news aggregation, prompt-driven advisory output, automated email delivery) with explicit guardrails and reflection on limitations, demonstrating effective AI integration beyond superficial use. Discover, Implement, and Reflect evidence collectively support a thorough, functional integration.
